item.title: Rachele add a quote by Napolean Hill
item.description: "If you are not learning while you’re earning, you are cheating yourself out of the better portion of your compensation." -- Napolean Hill

item.title: Rachele add a quote by Zig Ziglar
item.description: "Of course motivation is not permanent. But then, neither is bathing; but it is something you should do on a regular basis." -- Zig Ziglar

item.title: Rachele add a quote by Bette Davis
item.description: "To fulfill a dream, to be allowed to sweat over lonely labor, to be given a chance to create, is the meat and potatoes of life. The money is the gravy." -- Bette Davis

item.title: Rachele add a quote by H. Jackson Brown
item.description: "People take different roads seeking fulfillment and happiness. Just because they’re not on your road doesn’t mean they’ve gotten lost." -- H. Jackson Brown

item.title: Rachele add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Let me never fall into the vulgar mistake of dreaming that I am persecuted whenever I am contradicted." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Rachele add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "The ultimate measure of a man is not where he stands in moments of comfort and convenience, but where he stands at times of challenge and controversy." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Rachele add a quote by Theodore Roosevelt
item.description: "Do what you can, with what you have, where you are." -- Theodore Roosevelt

item.title: Rachele add a quote by Aesop
item.description: "No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted." -- Aesop
